short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make reading Achewood easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to read Achewood without using a mouse? This is a common thing people have wanted.

This extension lets you browse through the Achewood archives using the arrow keys on your keyboard, which is different from a mouse. You can also press the "A" key to view the alt text, or press "R" to view a random comic.

Please enjoy.
